annotations.description: Two Bartenders have laid claim to the creation of the Monkey Gland Cocktail, the first was Harry McElhone owner of Harry's American Bar in Paris (A bartender...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Monkey Gland

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Gin
1oz (30ml) Orange Juice
.5oz (15ml) Grenadine
Absinthe Rinse
Orange Twist

Rinse glass with absinthe
Shake and strain
Garnish with orange twist 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g7BcuYJrAbg
title: Monkey Gland
